keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: A filled Yorkshire pud - great for vegetarians.

method.text: Fry the garlic in the olive oil for 1 min. Add the red onion and fry until pale golden brown on all sides.
Add the tofu, mushrooms, broccoli, and red pepper. Toss all the ingredients together and season well.
Spread the tomato sauce on the base of the Yorkshire pudding. Top with the vegetable mixture. Sprinkle over the grated cheese.
Place in the oven for 10 min, until heated thoroughly. Serve immediately.

title: Cheesy tofu Yorkshire pudding
